programme.title: The strong dollar and Lindsay Wellington
programme.short_synopsis: A eulogy for Lindsay Wellington, who first commissioned Letter from America.
programme.medium_synopsis: The falling value of the British pound in comparison to the US dollar, and the death of Lindsay Wellington, the former head of the BBC in North America.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
